com.nifcloud.mbaas.core

Class NCMBUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBBase
      • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBObject
        • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBUser

  • public class NCMBUser
extends NCMBObject
    NCMBUser is used to sign up and login/logout the user
